name: CopywritingTips
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Copywriting is the most important skill in business. It's used to change prospects from uninterested to interested to buyers. Every day you'll get a new tip on how to improve your copywriting skills from Quentin Pain at Science of Copywriting. Join Quentin on Facebook as well and get the Science of Copywriting Weekly Newsletter and Rule Book.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
